ISSUE.TITLE: Is there any way to revert back to Highcharts ?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I understand that Plot.ly is open-source but is there anyway that I can still use 0.9.x but switch to Highcharts for graph plotting as it has several features that currently missed from Plot.ly implementation ? Thanks.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Show query results for execution after changing data sources (re #29) (fixes #774)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add tag filters to backend-unit-tests to allow deploy-milestone to build (#807)
